amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to exempt defense related activities from the Endangered Species Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exempt defense-related activities from the Endangered Species Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 231 (Roll no. 255).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 231 (Roll no. 255).
